column1: Smoque BBQ////Hands down the Best BBQ in town
column3: so we've tried lots of BBQ places around Chicagoland
column4: but nothing beats Smoque.  Not only do they BBQ it the right way
column6: the meat is so tender and tasty that you don't really need the BBQ sauce.  Besides the meat
column9: I always order an extra order of bake beans.  The only problem is the line
column10: you have to be prepared to wait in line if you came during weekend
column11: but you can remedy that by doing carryout and calling ahead.
